headline: Philip Morris International Inc. (PM): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Philip Morris International Inc. on Recital’s Substack by Anthony Yiu. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on PM. Philip Morris International Inc.’s share was trading at $160.92 as of July 25th. PM’s trailing and forward P/E were 23.81 and 21.51, respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Philip Morris […]

headline: 1 Cash-Producing Stock on Our Buy List and 2 We Avoid
summary: A company that generates cash isn’t automatically a winner. Some businesses stockpile cash but fail to reinvest wisely, limiting their ability to expand.
